rdf:Property.rdfs:label: était destiné à
was intended for
bestimmt für
был задуман для
προοριζόταν για
era destinado à
被制作来用於
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property links an instance of E71 Human-Made Thing to an E55 Type of usage. It creates a property between specific man-made things, both physical and immaterial, to Types of intended methods and techniques of use. Note: A link between specific man-made things and a specific use activity should be expressed using P19 was intended use of (was made for).
